name: Faust: The Seven Games of the Soul
name_original: Faust: The Seven Games of the Soul
description:
Faust: The Seven Games of the Soul is an adventure game developed by Arxel Tribe. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by Cryo Interactive Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Faust: The Seven Games of the Soul is available on PC.
